### the status  {.smaller}


<pre><code>#include &lt;sys/wait.h&gt;
...
  waitpid(child_pid, &amp;status, 0);
  if (<span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">WIFEXITED(status)</span>) {
    printf("main returned or exit called with %d\\n",
           <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">WEXITSTATUS(status)</span>);
  } else if (WIFSIGNALED(status)) {
    printf("killed by signal %d\\n", WTERMSIG(status));
  } else {
      ...
  }
</code></pre>
 ‘‘status code’’ encodes <em>both return value and if exit was abnormal</em> <br> W* macros to decode it
